izzy.datasets¶

Classes¶

RandomModelingDataset([n_observations, …])

Create a random dataset with a binary outcome for modeling tests

Functions¶

random_dataset([n_rows, n_columns, …])

Generates a dataset full of random numbers between 0 and 1

random_modeling_dataset([n_observations, …])

Wrapper function to initialize an instance of izzy.datasets.RandomModelingDataset
